sentences.sentence: The age of the myogenic culture affects the ability to fuse.
sentences.translation: 生肌培养物的年龄影响融合能力。

sentences.sentence: To investigate the feasibility of inducing marrow mesenchymal stem cells into myogenic cells in vitro.
sentences.translation: 研究骨髓间充质干细胞在体外诱导分化为肌源性细胞的可行性。

sentences.sentence: Enough satellite cells and beneficial myogenic environment were necessary to effective muscle regeneration.
sentences.translation: 有效的肌肉再生需要大量卫星细胞和有利的生肌环境。
